text:
The Martial Temple of [[Dol Arrah]] is an academy of war in [[Starilaskur]], [[Breland]] that specializes in honing the talents of [[Vassal|Sovereign Host]] [[cleric]]s and [[paladin]]s. The Martial Temple also provides supplies and other support to the [[Heavenly Fleet]] in the [[Lhazaar Principalities]].

The Temple is a campus consisting of several buildings around a central cloister, an open square with covered walks. The buildings include:

* a church with large stained-glass windows facing east to let in the light of the dawn
* dormitories
* a refectory (kitchen and dining room)
* a school and library
* a balneary (bathhouse)
* an infirmary
* a palaestra (training area and combat school)

The preceptor, or headmaster, of the Martial Temple is [[Cadoc Belmin]]; his prior is [[Hemdoth Aggan]]. Other important figures associated with the Temple include:

* Novice-master [[Wroenna Lonn]]
* Visitant [[Sejra Whitebinder]]
* Swordbrother [[Farlay]]
* [[Snarik the Mauve]]
* Master [[Marrath]]
title: Martial Temple of Dol Arrah
